data.description:
That damage becomes fire or ice, and its source deals extra damage equal to 【2 + the number of filled sections in your Brainwave Clock】.

  • Cost: @LOSS[max(5, (&cs('brainwave-clock')*5)) mp]{Psychic Gift}

  • Effect: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.UhniAQTvRDymARwH]{Effect: Thermokinesis (Fire)} @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.skills.ECmYpql8h2JfWAff]{Effect: Thermokinesis (Ice)}

  • Resolution: @CLOCK[brainwave-clock update 1]{Advance Brainwave Clock}
